1820.SR.long_name: Abdulmohsen Al-Hokair Group for Tourism and Development Company
1820.SR.summary: Abdulmohsen Al-Hokair Group for Tourism and Development Company operates primarily in the hospitality and entertainment sectors in the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia and the United Arab Emirates. It operates hotels and resorts, restaurants, and meeting and event venues. The company was founded in 1965 and is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia.
